message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's something truly special, and I believe it's worth $1750000. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you. Let me know your thoughts!
Alice, your product sounds great, but $1750000 is a bit outside my budget.  I'm willing to pay $1400000 for it.  This is my best offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm still looking for a bit more.  How about $1600000?  This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and it's closer to what I need to make this deal work. Let me know your thoughts!

Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $1600000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1500000. This is my final offer, and it's the absolute maximum I can spend. Let me know if you're willing to accept it.
